subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Jets ended an eight-game skid, scoring the game’s first 17 points and holding Ben Roethlisberger, who had thrown for 862 yards in his last two games, to 54 in the first half.
snippet: The Jets ended an eight-game skid, scoring the game’s first 17 points and holding Ben Roethlisberger, who had thrown for 862 yards in his last two games, to 54 in the first half.
